#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<math.h>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;
#define mod 10000

long long catalan(int n)
{
    int i,j;
    vector<long long> catalan(n+1);
    catalan[0]=catalan[1]=1;
    for (i=2; i<=n; i++)
    {
        catalan[i] = 0;
        for (j=0; j<i; j++)
        {
            catalan[i]+=((catalan[j]%mod) * (catalan[i-j-1]%mod))%mod;
            catalan[i]%=mod;
        }
        //cout<<catalan[i]<<endl;
    }
    return catalan[n-1];
}

int main()
{
    int n,t;
    cin>>t;
    for(int i=0;i<t;i++)
    {
        cin>>n;
        cout<<catalan(n)<<endl;
    }
}
